code: export var PROJECTS=[{name:"Girl Code",description:"Girl Code is a community-based platform designed to assist individuals with their menstrual needs, regardless of gender identity. It is intended for those experiencing period poverty and those who are able to offer assistance.",techStack:"React, Node.js,postgres, vercel and heroku",github:"https://github.com/C3-Team/girlcode-client",live:"https://girlcode-client.vercel.app/",image:"/girlcode.png",alt:"girl-code landing page image"},{name:"Poetlandia",description:"Poetlandia is a creation, collaboration and publication space for writers. This was a fun project to learn more about spaced-repetition and using different data structures to achieve this.",techStack:"React, Node.js, and postgres, vercel and heroku",github:"https://github.com/NikaDarab/spaced-repetition-client",live:"https://italingo.vercel.app/register",image:"/italingo.png",alt:"italingo landing page image"}];

sourcesContent:
export const PROJECTS = [
  {
    name: "Girl Code",
    description:
      "Girl Code is a community-based platform designed to assist individuals with their menstrual needs, regardless of gender identity. It is intended for those experiencing period poverty and those who are able to offer assistance.",
    techStack: "React, Node.js,postgres, vercel and heroku",
    github: "https://github.com/C3-Team/girlcode-client",
    live: "https://girlcode-client.vercel.app/",
    image: "/girlcode.png",

    alt: "girl-code landing page image",
  },
  {
    name: "Poetlandia",
    description:
      "Poetlandia is a creation, collaboration and publication space for writers. I built this app, because as an artist I am always looking for an opportunity to collaborate on stories, get inspired and share wih the community.",
    techStack: "React, Node.js, and postgres, vercel and heroku",
    github: "https://github.com/NikaDarab/poetlandia-client",
    live: "https://poetlandia-client.vercel.app/",
    image: "/poetlandia.png",
    alt: "poetlandia landing page image",
  },
  {
    name: "Italingo",
    description:
      "Italingo uses spaced repetition technique to help people memorize words in Italian. The app will display words in the Italian language, and ask you to recall the corresponding word in English. This is an app for anybody who likes to learn a few words in Italian! This was a fun project to learn more about spaced-repetition and using different data structures to achieve this.",
    techStack: "React, Node.js, and postgres, vercel and heroku",
    github: "https://github.com/NikaDarab/spaced-repetition-client",
    live: "https://italingo.vercel.app/register",
    image: "/italingo.png",
    alt: "italingo landing page image",
  },
];
